Peter Tosh
Pro Shot PAL DVD
1979-07-16 or 07/16/79
Jazz Festival, Montreux, Switzerland

Below is the text info that came with this when I got it from I think Reggae
Traders. Thanks to whoever shared it and liberated it. Very nice Pro Shot
footage of Peter Tosh. Not many Pro videos of him or Bob so I figured there
might be a few here that don't already have this one.

Another Classic From The Dubwise Garage Collection

Audio Source Information:
SBD > ? > CD-R > EAC > FLAC

Audio Patches:
1) About 5 minutes into 400 Years, 4 minutes and 58.493 seconds were missing from the sbd and was filled in using video audio.

2) Mystic Man > Pick Myself Up was missing from the sbd and was filled in using video audio.

Video Patches:
1) Legalize It was missing from the video and was filled in using graphics and sbd audio. 

Notes
-Video assets courtesy of the internet - thank you very much
-SBD torrented from the internet with many thanks
-Audio synchronization by Kevin Tobin using Adobe Audition to
compress/expand the audio in multitrack mode to match the original audio.
-Video patches created with Ulead VideoStudio 11 by Kevin Tobin.
-Multiplexing via TMPGEnc MPEG Editor by Kevin Tobin.
-DVD authoring via DVD Architect 6.0 by Kevin Tobin.
